link.title: The Excel Center: Tuition-Free High School for Adults

meta.content: The Excel Center is a free public school for adults that gives adults the opportunity to earn an Indiana Core 40 high school diploma.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_clickable et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.h1:
A FREE HIGH SCHOOL
FOR ADULTS

div.div: Since 2010, The Excel Center® has helped thousands of graduates increase their earning potential with a free Indiana Core 40 high school diploma. Ready to get started?

img.alt: mother daughter son adult high school graduation
img.title: family at graduation

div.p: On-site child care provided while you are in class.
Morning and afternoon classes available to work around your schedule. Select locations also offer evening classes.

p.span: Courses are bundled together so you earn credits at a faster rate.

img.alt: adult high school small class sizes

p.span: Class sizes are small so you receive one-on-one support and help as needed.
Life coaches work with you to create a graduation plan that best fits your goals and needs.

img.alt: adult high school college and career readiness

p.span: Earn free college credit and industry-recognized certifications while earning your diploma!

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_6 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular section_has_divider et_pb_top_divider

div.h2: Start your journey toward a new career

div.p: Designed to meet the needs of adults, The Excel Center helps students get ready for life after high school by earning college credits and industry-recognized certifications — all at no cost.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_dark
et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_dark
et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_dark

div.p: 99% of graduates earned college credits or industry-recognized certifications.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_dark

div.div: 280% increase in average wages one year after graduation

div.h2: Every Student has a story TO TELL.

div.h1: A Free High School For Adults

div.p: Since 2010, The Excel Center® has helped thousands of graduates increase their earning potential with a free Indiana Core 40 high school diploma. Ready to get started?

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_6 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: On-site child care provided while you are in class.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_7 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Morning and afternoon classes available to work around your schedule. Select locations also offer evening classes.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_8 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Courses are bundled together so you earn credits at a faster rate.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_9 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

img.alt: adult high school small class sizes

div.p: Class sizes are small so you receive one-on-one support and help as needed.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_10 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Life coaches work with you to create a graduation plan that best fits your goals and needs.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_11 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

img.alt: adult high school college and career readiness

div.p: Earn free college credit and industry-recognized certifications while earning your diploma!

div.h2: Start your journey toward a new career

div.p: Designed to meet the needs of adults, The Excel Center helps students get ready for life after high school by earning college credits and industry-recognized certifications — all at no cost.
